summary:
Overhauls the gameplay as a thief. 
The lockpick and pickpocket perk trees got converted into one usefull perk tree.
Additionaly i added a couple of tweaks to improve the pickpocketing,lockpicking and crime system.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://the-elder-scrolls-skyrim.de/images/oblivion/birthsigns/large/Menus/BirthSign/Birthsign_The%20Thief.png[/img][/center][size=+3][center][color=green][b][u]Thief improvement project[/u][/b][/color][/center][/size]
[img]http://ph-vyskoveprace.cz/images/czech_flag_small.jpg[/img][size=+1.5][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17958]Czech Translation can be found here[/url][/size]


[size=+2][color=green][b]Discription:[/b][/color][/size]
[size=+1.5]The story behind this mod is that i wanted to make a thief playthrough and got really disappointed from the lockpick and pickpocket perk trees. So i made the following changes:[/size]
[list]  
[size=+1.5][*]The lockpick and pickpocket perk trees got converted into one [u]usefull[/u] perk tree.
[*]Additionaly i added a couple of tweaks to improve the pickpocketing,lockpicking and crime system.
[/list][/size]

[size=+2][center][color=green][b]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b][/color][/center][/size]

[size=+2][color=green][b]New Feature!: [u]Lock Requirement[/u][/b][/color][/size]
[size=+1.5]Do you find it strange that you can pick a master lock with lockpicking skill 1?
[b]Here is the solution for that![/b]

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/17037-1-1337539434.jpg[/img]

The Script adds a requirement for every locked container [b][u](only works for containers like chest\'s atm)[/u][/b]

There are 3 Files to choose from:[/size]

[size=+1.5][b]Hard lock requirements:[/b][/size]
[list][size=+1.5][*]Master locks now need: 100 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Expert locks now need: 75 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Adept locks now need: 50 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Apprentice Locks now need: 25 Lockpicking skill.[/size]
[/list]

[size=+1.5][b]Medium lock requirements:[/b][/size]
[list][*][size=+1.5]Master locks now need: 75 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Expert locks now need: 50 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Adept locks now need: 25 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Apprentice Locks now need: 0 Lockpicking skill.[/size]
[/list]

[size=+1.5][b]Easy lock requirements:[/b][/size]
[list][*][size=+1.5]Master locks now need: 50 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Expert locks now need: 25 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Adept locks now need: 0 lockpicking skill.[/size]
[*][size=+1.5]Apprentice Locks now need: 0 Lockpicking skill.[/size]
[/list]

[size=+2][b]Known issue:[/b][/size]

[size=+1.5]If you load a save game where you are in a Cell (for example a house) with a locked container the script lets you try to pick the container [u]one time[/u].[/size]

[size=+2][center][color=green][b]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b][/color][/center][/size]

[color=green][b][size=+2]Perk changes:[/size][/b][/color]
[IMG]http://s14.directupload.net/images/120514/ewa9mw4w.jpg[/IMG]
[size=+2][center][color=green][b]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b][/color][/center][/size]
[color=green][b][size=+2]Perk requirements:[/size][/b][/color]
[img]http://s14.directupload.net/images/120515/acv5wnld.jpg[/img]
[size=+1.5]The first number stands for your Pickpocket skill and the second number is for your Lockpicking skill.
This meanse you need 20 points in pickpocket and lockpicking to be able to skill this perk.[/size]

[color=red][size=+1.5]But there is one exception:[/size][/color]
[size=+1.5]Light Fingers requires 0/20/40/60/80 Lockpicking [b][u]OR[/u][/b] Pickpocket skill[/size]

[size=+2][center][color=green][b]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b][/color][/center][/size]
[color=green][b][size=+2]Tweaks:[/size][/b][/color]

[size=+1.5]Pickpocket tweaks:[/size]
[list][size=+1.5][*]adjustable max pickpocket chance[/list][/size]
[list][size=+1.5][*]adjustable min pickpocket chance[/list][/size]


[size=+1.5]Lockpicking tweaks:[/size]
[list][size=+1.5][*]adjustable base sweet spot - [u]75% reduced sweet spot is highly recommended[/u][/list][/size]
[list][size=+1.5][*]adjustable how much the lockpicking skill effects the sweet spot[/list][/size]
[list][size=+1.5][*]added an option to make all locks harder[/list][/size]

[size=+1.5]Crime tweaks:[/size]
[list][size=+1.5][*]adjustable pickpocket crime costs
[*]adjustable attacking crime costs
[*]adjustable murderer crime costs
[*]adjustable crime radius
[/list][/size]
[size=+2][center][color=green][b]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b][/color][/center][/size]
[color=green][b][size=+2]Installation:[/size][/b][/color]

[size=+1.5][u]NMM installation:[/u][/size]
[size=+1.5]Just press the download with manager button, follow the instructions, pick the files you want and make sure the .esp\'s are activated. Enjoy :)[/size]

[size=+1.5][u]Manual installation:[/u][/size]
[size=+1.5]Copy the files you want in your skyrim/data folder and activate them.
Make sure you only picked one file of each category[/size]
[size=+2][center][color=green][b]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b][/color][/center][/size]
[color=green][b][size=+2]Recommended mods:[/size][/b][/color]
[list][size=+1.5][*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10456]Path of Shadows[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10336]Shenk Thievery Overhaul[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9829]more locked containers[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10037]ACE - Comprehensive Enhancements[/url]
[/list][/size]
[size=+1.5]Playing a thief is a totally enhanced experience with these mods, so make sure you check them out :)[/size]
[size=+2][center][color=green][b]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b][/color][/center][/size]
[color=green][b][size=+2]Final words:[/size][/b][/color]
[color=red][size=+1.5][u]Note:[/u]
This is only the Beta version so i\'m probably changing/adding perks, tweaks in the near future.[/size][/color]

[size=+1.5]Have fun :)
p.s I would like to get some feedback :)[/size]
